explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a yellow short-sleeved shirt and brown shorts is holding a gorilla mask and standing on the stairs. He is looking down at the mask in his hand with a slight smile. Behind him is a white wall, and under his feet is a yellow floor.

[0-4] The man in the yellow shirt runs up the stairs and suddenly stops. The scene switches to a woman in a black top and green skirt. She is sitting on the steps looking at her phone. Behind her is a closed brown door, and to her right is a glass window. The man in the yellow shirt quickly puts on the mask and jumps next to the woman in the green skirt. The woman in the green skirt grabs her phone in horror, shakes her arm, and looks to her left at the man in the yellow shirt.

[4-8] The man in the yellow shirt shakes his body and takes off the mask, smiling and talking to the woman in the green skirt. The woman in the green skirt looks unhappy at first, then opens her mouth wide in surprise. She and the man in the yellow shirt, still wearing the mask, quietly walk to a door. The man in the yellow shirt presses a switch on the wall and puts both hands on the wall. The woman in the green skirt stands next to him, looking happy.
